description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed Project is to support Croatia to absorb EU Funds in the research and innovation sector bycapacitating selected public sector organizations and stimulating the demand for those funds from the business and scientific communities.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :Borrower obligations to maintain overall responsibility and oversightof Project, carry out Project through MSES through its PIU and in accordance with PIP, POM and the Operational Procedures and nottoamend any of such documents without agreement of the Bank, and maintain institutional arrangements (PIU, Steering Committee,Working Group, and BICRO and UKF within MSES). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards (Continued | Description :No eligibility for TA or Sub-financing for any activities involvinginvoluntary taking of land resulting in relocation or loss of shelter, loss of assets or access to assets, loss of income sourcesor means of livelihood, or involving involuntary restriction of access to legally designated parks and protected areas; or anyactivities likely to have significant adverse environmental impacts | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :Obligations to ensure Project is carried out in accordance with EMF and not to amendit without prior approval of Bank; such provision also to apply to TA and to ensure TORs satisfactory to Bank and requiring TA tobe consistent with requirements of EMF; screening of TA activities and preparation of required documents in accordance with EMF;screening of Sub-financing for eligibility under EMF. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Terms and Conditions of the Sub-financing | Description :Borrower obligations regarding terms and conditions ofsub-financing, including on eligibility criteria, compliance with Operational Procedures, selection of sub-projects for financingbyBorrower, through MSEs, BICRO or UKF, maintenance of pre-screening and evaluation and supervision procedures for Sub-projects,obligations to make each Sub-financing under a Sub–financing Agreement. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Number of commercialization and collaboration agreements signed with industry
Value of collaboration and commercialization agreements signed with industry (in thousands Euro)
Number of collaboration projects between Diaspora and homeland researchers by UKF
Total value of projects committed and financed by UKF (in million Euros)
Number of workshops and conferences delivered to R&D institutions and beneficiaries
Six project proposals prepared for submission to EU Funds
Total value of projects in the pipeline for funding by EU Funds originated from UKF funded projects (in million Euro)
Number of foreign research institutions collaborated with by UKF projects
Number of products/processes/designs developed in projects within HAMAG-BICRO for which IPR will be sought
Total value of projects funded by Hamag-Bicro under the Project sub-financing (million EUR)
Total value of projects funded by UKF and HAMAG-BICRO under the Project sub-financing (in million Euro)
Total value of projects financed by HAMAG-BICRO (in million Euro)
Total value of projects in the pipeline for funding through the grant scheme managed by HAMAG-BICRO (in million Euro)
Number of researchers from the public sector included in Program II and III projects within HAMAG-BICRO
Total number of projects financed by HAMAG-BICRO
Number of trained staff in the MSES and its organizations and R&D institutions (e.g. HAMAG-BICRO, UKF, TTOs, CSF) on EU procedures for project preparation and implementation
Prepared set of innovation and R&D policy documents required for absorption of the EU Funds

target.value: Ex ante conditionalities for the use of EU funds for R&D are met ( 3 strategies).

actual.value: The Strategy on Education, Science and Technology was adopted by the Parliament in October 2014. The Smart Specialization Strategyhas been approved by the European Commission in March 2016. The National Research Infrastructure Roadmap has been updated followingthe approval of the Smart Specialization Strategy and was adopted.

title.narrative: The share of Hamag-Bicro's projects assigned to female applicants
The share of Hamag-Bicro's projects submitted by female applicants
The share of UKF grants assigned to female researchers (and the share of HAMAG-BICRO's projects assigned to female applicants)
The share of UKF grants submitted by female applicants (and the share of HAMAG- BICRO's projects submitted) by female applicants)
Total value of projects funded by CSF/UKF under the project subfinancing (EUR million)
